summary.experience: Over 60 years combined experience in injury law in Chicago
summary.attention: Personal attention from founding attorneys for every case

key_findings: Clean and professional homepage but limited trust signals (e.g. awards/client wins).
Site lacks mobile-responsive spacing and load speed optimization.
Limited posting or updates across social media channels.
recommendations: Add more trust signals like awards, client settlements posted publicly.
Encourage new Google reviews and post updates weekly.
